sqlMap.select: SELECT PROGRAMID as programid, NAME as name, CUSTOMERID as customerid, PROG_START_DATE as progStartDate, PROG_END_DATE as progEndDate, AGE_CATEGORY as ageCategory, PRODUCT_TYPEID as productTypeid, NORMS_GROUP as normsGroup, NORMS_YEAR as normsYear FROM PROGRAM_DIM WHERE PROGRAMID = #programid:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PROGRAM_DIM ( PROGRAMID, NAME, CUSTOMERID, PROG_START_DATE, PROG_END_DATE, AGE_CATEGORY, PRODUCT_TYPEID, NORMS_GROUP, NORMS_YEAR ) VALUES ( #programid:NUMERIC#, #name:VARCHAR#, #customerid:NUMERIC#, #progStartDate:TIMESTAMP#, #progEndDate:TIMESTAMP#, #ageCategory:VARCHAR#, #productTypeid:NUMERIC#, #normsGroup:VARCHAR#, #normsYear:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PROGRAM_DIM SET NAME = #name:VARCHAR#, CUSTOMERID = #customerid:NUMERIC#, PROG_START_DATE = #progStartDate:TIMESTAMP#, PROG_END_DATE = #progEndDate:TIMESTAMP#, AGE_CATEGORY = #ageCategory:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_TYPEID = #productTypeid:NUMERIC#, NORMS_GROUP = #normsGroup:VARCHAR#, NORMS_YEAR = #normsYear:VARCHAR# WHERE PROGRAMID = #programid:NUMERIC#
